identity.name: BLACK SYNDICATE
principles: Darkness is the canvas, Light is the weapon.
Motion must feel dangerous (sparks, glitches, shocks).
No flat surfaces; everything has depth, grain, or glow.

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Impact text

mono.usage: Code snippets, decorative data points, coordinates

textures.grid: linear-gradient(to right, #1f2937 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(to bottom, #1f2937 1px, transparent 1px)

hover_shock.description: Rapid x/y translation (shake) + brightness flash + border glow expansion

specs.interaction: Cards scale up slightly + border turns electric blue/purple

specs.layout: Asymmetrical (Text Left, Image Right with Glitch Effect)

specs.style: Minimal, massive typography for brand name
specs.border: Top border with glowing gradient line

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px, sharp edges if possible

libraries.installation_command: npm install framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge react-tsparticles tsparticles-slim

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add 'Unbounded' and 'Rajdhani' from Google Fonts to public/index.html.
3. THEME: Force dark mode in tailwind.config.js or index.css. The site should NEVER be light.
4. GLOBAL CSS: Add the 'noise' texture as a fixed overlay on the body with pointer-events-none.
5. ANIMATION: Create a custom 'shock' keyframe in tailwind.config.js that translates x/y randomly by 2px.
6. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn for interactive elements (Dialogs, Forms) but heavily style them to match the Neon/Dark aesthetic. Remove all default white backgrounds.
7. PARTICLES: Configure tsparticles to use 'links' or 'star' preset with purple/blue colors.
8. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure neon text has sufficient contrast against the black background. Use text-shadow to enhance legibility.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style

Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
